pullRequest.title: add logging in UI Atomation Infrastucture

commit.message: update prompthandler logging statements in uiautomation/app

nodes.bodyText: you could also add a log above in the enableAutomaticTimeZone method
let's also log the resource id in the log message
let's also log the resource id and enabled value in the log message
let's also log the text in the log message
let's also log the text in the log message
let's also log the resource id in the log message
let's also log the text and class name in the log message
let's also log the resource id in the log message
Let's log the action in the log message
let's log the command in the log message
let's log the command in the log message
let's log the package in the log message
let's log the package name and flags in the log message

I don't like statements here that sound more like a javadoc type of description such as "Launches an activity specified by the action.."
I would rather prefer logs to be more like telling what is happening at the present time such as telling a sequence of events as they happen - something like: "Launching an activity specified by the action: " + action
I would give the same feedback for all other places
